attributes.action: HALF THE CURRENT INCOME TAX RATES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Debt, Poverty, Recession, Re-possessions, Bailiffs ? 
 
I am the only working partner as my wife looks after the children, 
 
My salary is butchered by the tax man every pay day. 
 
We struggle and take on extra work just to make up on what we lose in tax, only to be taxed on that to. 
 
I propose to reduce the current income tax rates to a mere 10% for incomes up to £50,000 and 20% over. 
 
WE as a nation are in financial trouble and I blame the Government for taking our hard earned money away from us so they can claim second homes etc.  
 
Its time for change and its time for the government to give something back to the public, Where better to start than our own hard earned money.  
 
They have abused there power 
They have been spending our money 
 
IT is time that We stood firm.  
IT is our money. 
They are our voice, So lets tell them what we want!
